column2: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] holds all the de-jure lands of an Empire. You can make [Root.GetHerHim] the [Root.GetKingQueen] of all these lands by forming a High Kingdom.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] holds all the de-jure lands of an Empire. Rather than forming the Empire, [Root.GetHerHim] can declare [Root.GetHimselfHerself] the High [Root.GetKingQueen].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] holds all the de-jure lands of [From.GetHersHis] Empire. [From.GetTitledFirstName] can consolidate power into a High Kingdom.
